item.description: HI, My name is Edgar, I live in ðŸ—½ and I am a Senior Software Engineer with 10+ years of experience in several technologies, languages, frameworks, and databases, aka Full-Stack Engineer. In this past years I have worked with plenty environments, developing tools, methodologies and version control tools for small and multinational teams. I have proficiently worked in different business areas like retail, e-commerce, security, education, energy and health industries.
